Directions: In a bowl, combine the first eight ingredients; set aside. Pat salmon dry. Place, skin side down, in a 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray. Spritz salmon with butter-flavored spray; cover with crumb mixture. Spritz crumbs with butter-flavored spray. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 15-20 minutes or until fish flakes with a fork.
